cast.overview: A fictional history of two legendary revolutionaries' journey away from home before they began fighting for their country in the 1920s.
cast.title: RRR

details.biography: Rahul Ramakrishna is an Indian Telugu-language, journalist, actor and writer. After discontinuing his engineering in 3rd year, he worked as a journalist in a evening daily, Post Noon, and Metro India. He also worked as a translator for national media journalists and a Swedish newspaper. He also wrote movie reviews for Hindustan Times website. He started his film career in theater. He made his debut with TV short film, Sainma.
details.name: Rahul Ramakrishna
